name: TankShooters
description:
The Third Eye games.

You play as a General in a tank. The enemies are launching missiles and you have to protect your base. Kill all the enemies and make sure you don't die. 

**Do not click outside the screen when playing.**

MY Game Engine:

Unity : https://unity3d.com/get-unity/download

My Art Software:

ProMotion NG : https://www.cosmigo.com/pixel_animation_software/downloads

GIMP: https://www.gimp.org/downloads/

My Music Software:

Lmms : https://lmms.io/download#windows

Audacity : https://www.audacityteam.org/download/
